textBox.richText: Hi Everyone, Exhibitor Show '09 starts this morning and Trussworks is debuting our newest product, Hyperlite! It is a 5-way 3" round extrusion with flat EZ6 horizontals. Just like EZ6, it assembles fast and easy with wingnuts. We have put together a dozen kits and got the product up on our website. Check it out at http://www.trussworks.com/Trussworks_Home_Page.html. Attached you'll find a couple of renderings. One is our gorgeous display which features the 612 beams and has a 10' wide Hyperlite closet in the back. The other is a Hyperlite kit design. Make sure you check out the whole line at http://www.trussworks.com/Trussworks_Home_Page.html. Thank you and I hope to see you at booth 575! Roy Trussworks
